title: Coronavirus capital by capital: How are Europeans coping with shutdown?
description: Europeans face a blizzard of restrictions on their freedoms as authorities try to stop the spread.
content:
Image caption
 For BBC Rome correspondent Mark Lowen, Italy's deserted capital is reminiscent of wartime curfews
Across the Continent, Europeans are facing a barrage of restrictions on their freedoms as the authorities struggle to stop the new
